events.message: The client reported that their car was involved in a collision at an intersection last night.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident due to the involvement of a vehicle collision.
An agent was assigned to manage the claim and assist the client throughout the process.
The insurance company acknowledged receipt of the claim and confirmed that the process has begun.
Requested police report and photos of the damaged vehicle to proceed with investigation.
Client submitted the police report and vehicle photographs as requested for the claim investigation.
Investigation team began reviewing submitted documents and contacting involved parties to verify incident facts.
Investigation completed successfully with all details verified matching client's account of the collision.
A settlement offer was proposed to the client covering vehicle repair costs and related damages.
Client expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and timely communication throughout the process.
Claim has been approved based on the investigation outcome and agreed settlement terms.
The payment covering all approved damages was issued to the clientâ€™s account promptly.
The claim case was officially closed after successful payment and confirmation of client acceptance.
All documentation and case files were archived for future reference as per company policy.
